title: Blissful Spicers Country Retreat Just One Hour from Brisbane
description: Breathe in fresh country air at Spicers Hidden Vale, set on 12,000 acres of pristine native bushland. The property harks back to the charm of a bygone era with a collection of luxurious suites and sophisticated colonial cottages, restored to embrace the authentic farmhouse atmosphere. Just one hour from Brisbane, the retreat offers tranquil days exploring nature, followed by paddock-to-plate modern Australian cuisine at the award-winning Homage Restaurant, all while soaking in the spectacular valley views.
offer_address: 617 Grandchester Mount Mort Road, Grandchester Queensland 4340, Australia
